chunk:
COSRX Centella Water Alcohol-Free Toner

Brand: COSRX

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Mineral Water, Centella Asiatica Leaf Water , Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Panthenol, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethyl Hexanediol

Directions: After Cleansing, Spray the Toner Onto a Cotton Pad and Gently Wipe Onto Face, Avoiding the E

Face, Avoiding the Eye and Mouth Area. Use as a Mist to Freshen Up Throughout the Day.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
